author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.

author: Christopher Reeve
quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.

author: Oprah Winfrey
quote: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.

author: Deepak Chopra
quote: The past is gone, the future is not here, now I am free of both. Right now, I choose joy.

author: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

author: Zig Ziglar
quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Jawaharlal Nehru
quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
quote: Donâ€™t limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
